content.body: i can't do next 2 weeks at all
will be at a team event in europe
Mathieu Hofman: i can still discuss async though. perhaps we should start a thread about your ideas for a registry that's acceptable?
content.formatted_body: Mathieu Hofman: i can still discuss async though. perhaps we should start a thread about your ideas for a registry that's acceptable?

content.body: I'm honestly not sure I'll have the bandwidth to collect my thoughts on a capability based type registry. I would however love to hear more from littledan who suggested something around modules.
content.formatted_body: I'm honestly not sure I'll have the bandwidth to collect my thoughts on a capability based type registry. I would however love to hear more from @littledan:matrix.org who suggested something around modules.
